oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Sword and Southern Cross medal
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Model 1860 U.S. staff and field officer's sword manufactured by Springfield Armory and Southern Cross belonging to William Fairchild Dennis Jr. (October 17, 1845 - June 9, 1927). Dennis served with the Raymond Minute Men of Hinds County, Mississippi, one of four units in the 3rd Battalion under Aaron B. Hardcastle. Dennis is buried at Greenwood Cemetery, Jackson, Mississippi.
oai_dc:dc.dc:source: Metro Archives, Nashville, Davidson County, Tennessee
